pages.title: Your practice goal
pages.text: What type of teacher feedback did you plan to practice in today's session?
options: Clarify - Ask students to provide more information or explain their reasoning to understand their thinking
Reflect - Share back student feelings, knowledge, or thinking
Teach - Provide students with fact statements, directions, strategies

pages.title: Explore the Timeline Tool (below)
pages.text: How effective was this practice session toward reaching your goal?

pages.title: Your thinking effort
pages.text: Describe your thinking effort during your practice

pages.title: How effective was this practice session at strengthening your awareness of teacher feedback
pages.text: What did you hear in the student responses?
options: Academic Language (conversational language, vocabulary, details, complex sentences)
Knowledge (tangential comments, prior knowledge, evidence, evidence with explanation)

pages.title: What are you taking away for your teaching practice?
When you try the simulation again, what kind of feedback do you want to increase?
options: Clarify - questions to ensure you understand student responses
Reflect - statements that share back to students your understanding of their ideas
Teach - cultivate student learning by sparking curiosity, redirecting thinking, providing information, directing careful examination, prompting reflection
Extend - ask students to summarize, articulate thinking (metacognition), synthesize & apply, or engage in related challenge
